content: Vacuum pump DD VP-U 120V ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Diamond coring- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ruggedly built, compact vacuum pump Compatible to all Hilti vacuum pads and drill stands High suction capacity Low noise ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: DD 120, DD 150-U, DD 160, DD 200, DD 250, DD 250-CA, DD 30-W, DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA, DD 750-HY Minimum relative vacuum: 700 mbar Hose length: 3000 mm Technical Data | For use with | DD 120, DD 150-U, DD 160, DD 200, DD 250, DD 250-CA, DD 30-W, DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA, DD 750-HY | Hose length | 3000 mm | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 19.8 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 15.1 x 6.1 x 11.1 in | IP protection class | IP 54 (EN 60529) | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 73 dB (A) | 1 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 408998 - Vacuum pump DD VP-U 120V - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD VP-U 120V US Vacuum pump
